channel.title: CVE Feed for imbrn -- v8n
channel.description: The latest CVEs for imbrn -- v8n

item.title: CVE-2022-35923|2024-08-03T09:51:58.523Z -- imbrn -- v8n
item.description: v8n is a javascript validation library. Versions of v8n prior to 1.5.1 were found to have an inefficient regular expression complexity in the `lowercase()` and `uppercase()` regex which could lead to a denial of service attack. In testing of the `lowercase()` function a payload of 'a' + 'a'.repeat(i) + 'A' with 32 leading characters took 29443 ms to execute. The same issue happens with uppercase(). Users are advised to upgrade. There are no known workarounds for this issue.
